effect_entries.effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in first in the Pokéathlon Hurdle Dash.
effect_entries.short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in first in the Pokéathlon Hurdle Dash.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ポケスロンの　記録が　はいっている。
ダッシュハードル　１位　回数が
記録された　カード。

It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a
card that shows how many times you
won the Pokéathlon’s Hurdle Dash.

Contiene i tuoi dati Pokéathlon.
Su questa Scheda è registrato il numero di
vittorie a Corsostacoli.

Contiene los datos del Pokéathlon con el número
de victorias en Metegoles.

Speichert deine Pokéathlon-Rekorde. Die Karte
zeigt, wie oft du beim Hürdenlauf den 1. Platz
belegt hast.

Contient vos données du Pokéathlon.
Sur cette carte est inscrit le nombre de victoires
à la Cours’Obstacles.

포켓슬론의 기록이 들어 있다.
대시허들 1위 횟수가
기록된 카드.

ポケスロンの　きろくが　はいっている。
ダッシュハードル　１い　かいすうが
きろくされた　カード。

It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a
card that shows how many times you’ve
won the Hurdle Dash.

It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a
card that shows how many times you’ve
won the Hurdle Dash.

Contient vos données du Pokéathlon.
Sur cette carte est inscrit le nombre
de victoires à la Cours’Obstacles.

It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a
card that shows how many times you’ve
won the Hurdle Dash.
